Blog.post: Last weekend was quality. Apart from the fact I didnt realise, just how steep the hills were in Bristol. The club called Bar Latino was very cool as it had an outsidey bit. The music was good and so was the crowd. It was a 'Kingpin' Promotions night. My mate didn't win but he thoroughly enjoyed it. Obligatory hangover the next day. So far haven't smoked since Sunday evening this is going to be a bit of a test these Nicorette patches seem to be working tho ..., might go clubbing in London on friday, then down to near Portsmouth for a do in a field with some mates. The weather looks good so it should be enjoyable, hope the stereo doesent pop a fuse.
Off to the pub tonight to play pool. Hope I don't f*ck up too much. Anyway got to go have a shower.

Well i'm off to bristol to go to a DJ competiton, mate is djing nu skool breaks. Hope he wins, the tune selection should be good, but there were a few galloping horses last time I heard him. Staying at a Dj's house over there with mates. And on saturday, just going to my local town to the pub, which should be cool to see some old friends from school. Another note www.drop-the-bomb.co.uk Should be a wicked party... Gabba , Doomcore , Oldskool and other such forms of kickdrum driven music.
Well it's 11am and I havent done any work yet. Better get on the case.

1 Cig, 1 cup of water. Turned off my Love @ Lycos account. Can't be arsed with it anymore, gonna wait till I get set up through a friend of a friend. Generally it works out better, and I think that the people i meet thorugh friends will have less hidden issues!

So when I get to work.. what websites do i check every day. www.matroxusers.com www.tomshardware.com www.amdzone.com http://news.bbc.co.uk www.anandtech.com www.theregister.co.uk www.theinquirer.net Force of habit I suppose.

Well, so much for me quitting smoking today. Bought 20 BnH this morning, pack of chewing gum, and a copy of 'The Sun' only to find out a lady at work had already bought it. My desk is in a state, but it is in better condition than yesterday. So far 1 cup of coffee 9.20 1 Cig

Anyway here we go decided to start my first blog in an effort to make myself better.. Current missions... - Stop smoking I have been smoking since 19, started at uni by smoking ganja. Always used to think that what's the point in smoking cigs when they dont actually do anything.. I want to quit as this thing has got a hold over me. Starting tomorrow, seeing as tomorrow never comes... Tomorrow is Thursday 22nd July 2004. - Manage my money better Bit carefree with my spending. If I dont wait till i get it. Generally this whole thing is about me trying to get a bit more self control. I will try and update it and hopefully you guys/gals can see how I do, roughly where I go and what I do. Hey If I fail I might be able to find out why.. I'm getting tired of letting myself down.
